set.name: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

property.name: Race
property.value: Zenith Celes

property.name: Rules
property.value: {CRYSTAL SOUL} 3 (While you are summoning this creature, the mana number of face down cards in your mana zone becomes 3.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of creatures from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest into your mana zone face down. ■ While this creature is tapped, your opponent's creature's can't attack you. {ETERNAL KAPPA} (When this creature would leave, you may turn 3 face down cards in your mana zone face up instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

property.name: Race
property.value: Unknown Celes

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {CRYSTAL SOUL} 2 (While you are summoning this creature, the mana number of face down cards in your mana zone becomes 2.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's elements and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck. Then your opponent draws a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Put the top card of your deck face down into your mana zone tapped. {CRYSTAL MANA} (A face down card in your mana zone is treated as a colorless card with a mana number of 1. Its owner may look at them at any time.) ■ Crystal Arms 2: If you have 2 or more face down cards in your mana zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone face down.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {CRYSTAL SOUL} 2 (While you are summoning this creature, the mana number of face down cards in your mana zone becomes 2.) ■ When you put this creature, you may choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: "This is a Duel Where Your Life is at Stake"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone face down. {CRYSTAL MANA} (A face down card in your mana zone is treated as a colorless card with a mana number of 1. Its owner may look at them at any time.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Zenith or colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then you may turn a card in your mana zone face down. ​{CRYSTAL MANA} (A face down card in your mana zone is treated as a colorless card with a mana number of 1. Its owner may look at them at any time.)

property.name: Rules

Its owner may look at them at any time.) ■ Your Zenith and Unknown creatures cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may return a colorless card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.value: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone face down. {CRYSTAL MANA} (A face down card in your mana zone is treated as a colorless card with a mana number of 1. Its owner may look at them at any time.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

card.name: Crys = Tabula = Rasa, Lord of the Flies

property.name: Race
property.value: Zenith Celes

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Zenith (When one of your zenith attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) {WORLD BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each player puts all cards in their hand into their mana zone face down. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells that cost less than the number of face down cards in your mana zone. {ETERNAL KAPPA} (When this creature would leave, you may turn 3 face down cards in your mana zone face up instead.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP2 Character Premium Deck: LOST Crystal Bridal

property.name: Race
property.value: Zenith Celes

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gravity Zero: If you have 5 or more face down cards in your mana zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can attack your opponent the turn it is put. ■ When you put this creature, return a Zenith or colorless card from your graveyard to your hand.
